refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function is intended to work like the classic operators \ and / x = A\b and x = b/A) i.e. it solves a linear system Ax = b or xA = b with a sparse square (says n x n) real or complex matrix and with a compatible rhs b : n x m in the first case and m x n in the second.

refsection.title: Details
refsection.para: First an LU factorization of the matrix is computed ( P R^(-1) A Q = LU where P and Q are permutation matrices, R is a diagonal matrix (row scaling), L a lower triangular matrix with a diagonal of 1, and U an upper triangular matrix) then a first solution is computed with forward/backward substitutions ; finaly the solution is improved by iterative refinement.
